verses.verse: When Israel <WH3478> was a child <WH5288>, then I loved <WH157> him, and called <WH7121> my son <WH1121> out of Egypt <WH4714>.
As they called <WH7121> them, so they went <WH1980> from them <WH6440>: they sacrificed <WH2076> unto Baalim <WH1168>, and burned incense <WH6999> to graven images <WH6456>.
I taught <WH8637> Ephraim <WH669> also to go <WH8637>, taking <WH3947> them by their arms <WH2220>; but they knew <WH3045> not that I healed <WH7495> them.

I drew <WH4900> them with cords <WH2256> of a man <WH120>, with bands <WH5688> of love <WH160>: and I was to them as they that take off <WH7311> the yoke <WH5923> on their jaws <WH3895>, and I laid <WH5186> meat <WH398> unto them.
Â¶ He shall not return <WH7725> into the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, but the Assyrian <WH804> shall be his king <WH4428>, because they refused <WH3985> to return <WH7725>.
And the sword <WH2719> shall abide <WH2342> on his cities <WH5892>, and shall consume <WH3615> his branches <WH905>, and devour <WH398> them, because of their own counsels <WH4156>.
And my people <WH5971> are bent <WH8511> to backsliding <WH4878> from me: though they called <WH7121> them to the most High <WH5920>, none at all <WH3162> would exalt <WH7311> him.

How shall I give thee up <WH5414>, Ephraim <WH669>? how shall I deliver <WH4042> thee, Israel <WH3478>? how shall I make <WH5414> thee as Admah <WH126>? how shall I set <WH7760> thee as Zeboim <WH6636>? mine heart <WH3820> is turned <WH2015> within me, my repentings <WH5150> are kindled <WH3648> together <WH3162>.

I will not execute <WH6213> the fierceness <WH2740> of mine anger <WH639>, I will not return <WH7725> to destroy <WH7843> Ephraim <WH669>: for I am God <WH410>, and not man <WH376>; the Holy One <WH6918> in the midst <WH7130> of thee: and I will not enter <WH935> into the city <WH5892>.

They shall walk <WH3212> after <WH310> the LORD <WH3068>: he shall roar <WH7580> like a lion <WH738>: when he shall roar <WH7580>, then the children <WH1121> shall tremble <WH2729> from the west <WH3220>.

They shall tremble <WH2729> as a bird <WH6833> out of Egypt <WH4714>, and as a dove <WH3123> out of the land <WH776> of Assyria <WH804>: and I will place <WH3427> them in their houses <WH1004>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>.

Ephraim <WH669> compasseth <WH5437> me about with lies <WH3585>, and the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> with deceit <WH4820>: but Judah <WH3063> yet ruleth <WH7300> with God <WH410>, and is faithful <WH539> with the saints <WH6918>.
